DOC.brief_summary: This study determine whether different type resistant starch different effect blood glucose healthy adult .
DOC.detailed_description: Each volunteer visit laboratory 10-12 hour fast state three occasion three-week period , two visits/wk , least 48 hour visit . Volunteers ask refrain vigorous physical activity consumption alcohol day test visit . Randomization use Latin Square design apply minimize confounding issue associate order administration . In morning test , finger-prick capillary blood sample collect determine fasting ( baseline ) blood glucose level . The volunteer consume test solution assign trial . Ten minute allow test solution consume . Over two hour follow start test , finger-prick capillary blood sample collect 30 , 60 , 90 , 120 min . Blood glucose level immediately measure duplicate use automate blood glucose analyzer ( YSI 2300 , Yellow Springs , OH ) . Analysis collect sample repeat difference duplicate sample great 0.1 mmol/L . Once sample analyze , data enter incremental area curve calculate use trapezoidal model ( GraphPad v5.0 , La Jolla , CA ) .
DOC.criteria: apparently healthy diagnosis chronic disease wheat allergy
